All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AesGcmProvider
AES-GCM encryption provider with configurable security profiles.
CryptoDemo
Demonstration of the encryption abstraction layer.
EncryptionProvider
Interface for authenticated encryption operations.
EncryptionResult
Immutable container for encrypted data with associated metadata.
HashedPassword
Immutable data holder for a hashed password.
Main
Main entry point for the Vault application.
PasswordValidator
 
PBKDF2Hasher
Utility class for hashing passwords and deriving keys using PBKDF2 (HMAC-SHA256).
SecurityProfile
Defines a cryptographic security profile with specific algorithm parameters.
TestMain
Test version of Main.java that accepts password as command-line argument for testing.
TestSave
 
ValidationResult
 
VaultSecurityTest
Advanced test suite for the password manager vault core.
VaultSession
Manages the unlocked state of the vault as a strict state machine.
VaultStorage
Handles persistent storage for the vault, including saving and loading the master key hash.
